extendedInfo.description: âThe super hit iOS game, is now available on your Android device!âFinger Slayer is most thrilling reaction time game specially designed for Android. Test your reaction time by trying to evade the guillotine blade.Simply place your finger on guillotine circle and wait for 3,2,1 & Go count. After Go count remove your finger as soon as blade drops. The longer you wait till the blade falls the higher the score. Also if you remove your finger to early then the game ends so timing is essential. â Features:â Endless Game Modeâ Realistic sound effectsâ² We're already working on a new update! In the mean time, please keep playing, keep reviewing, and keep sharing the app with your friends. We'll keep providing updates! :- )Thank you for playing Finger Slayer!

reviews.title: Addictive.. !!
reviews.comment: Very very,  probably the most addictive game for phones..  Seriously, do not try if you dont want to get hooked.  But its a really fun game as well..  And it improves your reactions as well..  Amazing!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not as easy as I thought!
reviews.comment: Love the game! My boyfriend and I take turns yelling at eachother before our fingers get sliced! Its very fun and addictive!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Do u no that that this game is a corruption because if we want to get sum stars so this game force US to download  the poor games of this company lick lucky bingo etc. So I am warning u to Not to download this game.

reviews.title: Awesome!!
